sun.jvm.hotspot.debugger.win32.coff

Interface OptionalHeader


  • public interface OptionalHeader
    Models the information stored in the optional header of a Portable Executable file.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static short MAGIC_PE32
      Magic number for a PE32 file
      static short MAGIC_PE32_PLUS
      Magic number for a PE32+ file
      static short MAGIC_ROM_IMAGE
      Magic number for a "ROM image"

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OptionalHeaderDataDirectories getDataDirectories()
      Gets the data directories portion of the optional header.
      short getMagicNumber()
      Returns the magic number of the Optional Header (MAGIC_PE32, MAGIC_PE32_PLUS, or MAGIC_ROM_IMAGE)
      OptionalHeaderStandardFields getStandardFields()
      These are defined for all implementations of COFF, including UNIX.
      OptionalHeaderWindowsSpecificFields getWindowsSpecificFields()
      These include additional fields to support specific features of Windows (for example, subsystem).

    • Field Detail

    • Method Detail

      • getMagicNumber

        short getMagicNumber()
        Returns the magic number of the Optional Header (MAGIC_PE32, MAGIC_PE32_PLUS, or MAGIC_ROM_IMAGE)

      • getStandardFields

        OptionalHeaderStandardFields getStandardFields()
        These are defined for all implementations of COFF, including UNIX.

      • getWindowsSpecificFields

        OptionalHeaderWindowsSpecificFields getWindowsSpecificFields()
        These include additional fields to support specific features of Windows (for example, subsystem).

      • getDataDirectories

        OptionalHeaderDataDirectories getDataDirectories()
        Gets the data directories portion of the optional header.
